steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_executions --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_test_project --> navigate to Page_test-project
step 5: At Page_test-project click on hyperlink_test_project
step 6: At Page_test-project click on hyperlink_test_planning --> navigate to Page_test-planning
step 7: At Page_test-planning click on hyperlink_grid --> navigate to Page_grid
step 8: At Page_grid click on hyperlink_test_project --> navigate to Page_test-project
step 9: At Page_test-project click on hyperlink_test_environment_installation --> navigate to Page_test-environment-installation
step 10: Add visual checkpoint at Page_test-environment-installation
